title: Synthesio AI Analytics Dashboard
text:
R Shiny
  Claude AI
  DuckDB
  ellmer

title: Synthesio AI Analytics Dashboard
text:
The Problem
Business intelligence tools typically require either expensive licences, specialist SQL knowledge, or slow report-request cycles. The question: what if anyone could ask a plain English question and get an instant, visualised, AI-narrated answer?

title: Synthesio AI Analytics Dashboard
text:
The Solution
Synthesio is a proof-of-concept AI analytics dashboard built entirely in R. It combines:

ellmer — to interface with Claude’s API for both SQL generation and insight narration
DuckDB — as a fast, embedded analytical database (no server required)
R Shiny + shinychat — for the interactive dashboard and conversational UI
Plotly + reactable — for rich visualisations and searchable data tables

title: Synthesio AI Analytics Dashboard
text:
Architecture
The core pipeline follows three steps:

NL → SQL — The user’s question is sent to Claude along with a database schema description. Claude returns a valid DuckDB SQL query.
SQL → Results — The query executes against the Northwind database in DuckDB, returning a dataframe.
Results → Insight — The dataframe is summarised and sent back to Claude, which returns a business narrative in markdown.


  User question
     ↓ generate_sql() via ellmer + Claude
  SQL query
     ↓ dbGetQuery() via DuckDB
  Dataframe
     ↓ generate_insight() via ellmer + Claude
  Markdown narrative + Plotly chart + reactable table

title: Synthesio AI Analytics Dashboard
text:
Key Technical Decisions
Why DuckDB? Fast columnar analytics without any server setup. Works perfectly with R via the DBI interface, and handles CSV imports gracefully with readr::read_csv.
Why ellmer? The cleanest R-native interface to Claude’s API. Supports streaming, tool use, and multi-turn conversations — important for future iterations.
Why shinychat? Provides a ready-made chat UI component that integrates seamlessly with Shiny’s reactive model, allowing the AI conversation to drive dashboard state.

title: Synthesio AI Analytics Dashboard
text:
What’s Next

Connecting to live databases (PostgreSQL, Snowflake)
Multi-turn conversational memory for follow-up questions
User authentication and saved query history
Deployment to a cloud environment with secure API key management

Background
    About Me

        Sergei Dumnov
        Data Scientist · AI Developer
        
          ⟶ GitHub
          ⟶ LinkedIn
        
      

      
        
          I'm a data scientist and analytics developer with a passion for making data
          accessible and actionable. My current focus is on integrating AI capabilities
          into traditional analytics workflows — bridging the gap between business questions
          and data-driven answers.
        
        
          The Synthesio project grew out of a simple question: what would analytics
          look like if anyone could talk to their data? I'm exploring that idea using
          R, Shiny, DuckDB, and Claude — building tools that are both technically rigorous
          and genuinely usable by non-technical stakeholders.
